description: This file defines a React component 'IssuesDialog' that displays a dialog with a list of Jira issues, including functionalities for editing issues, viewing details, and linking to external Jira pages. It also manages internal state for editing issues and handles loading/error states.

methods.name: getStatusColor
methods.description: Returns a color class based on the status category key of a Jira issue.

methods.name: IssuesDialog
methods.description: React functional component that renders a dialog listing Jira issues with options to edit and view details.
